title: Who do you distrust?
content:
The PCKF has been infiltrated, somone among us is working to destroy the community! Who do you think is acting the most suspicious here, what do you think their goals are, and who are they working for?A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: Re: Who do you distrust?
content:
What? Why are you looking at me?!

ALRIGHT! I admit it, I am working for iD. I sell them information about what the Keen community is doing. I warn them when you're all getting too close to a new modding breakthrough. My information is why so many promising fan projects suddenly cease to exist.

And I regret nothing.


...
..
What? You just wanted me to pass that Garg? Oh.

title: Re: Who do you distrust?
content:
Well there is one certain member that comes to mind. To protect his identity though, I shall refer to him simply as "Mr.H" so no one will know who I am talking about.

When Mr.H first appeared on the forums he started flooding the PCKF with such pointless topics as "What got me interested in (insert subject here) anyway." or "My new idea!". At first I thought that he was actually the one called "it" or better known as "Shockshund". But after repeated posts without some kind of "shock" in them I came to this very startling realization.

MR.H IS ACTUALLY AN AGENT OF "IT"!

For months "it" has been observing Mr.H on various forums. Mr.H is never able to stay in one place because of the community banding together and throwing him out. "it" decided that this is the best agent he could of ever wished for. "it" told Mr.H about the PCKF and told him to just "be himself." "it" knowing that the PCKF members are too nice to ever kick a member out and would never be able to tell Mr.H what they think about his antics. This will lead to the entire PCKF committing Suicide. Then the torrent of news coverage on how a simple computer game character made fans commit suicide would force ID to never make another Commander Keen again.

This is the ultimate goal.-----------------------
"The Adventures of Commander Keen" issue #1: [img]http://img93.imageshack.us/img93/8904/wid1kx.png[/img]
"Fat people buy lots"

HS: It wasn't me! It isn't me! IT'S EZBOARD'S FAULT!!! Ezboard said "Let's make a forum making site that also hosts forums!" Then after just ten days they said "Lets destroy it!" So the deleted almost everything on every board, and one day, they just destroy their entire website, and our forum will be history! And, most likely, one of us is helping them! And that one of us is most likely EVERYONE BUT ME, WHO IS THE MOST HONEST PERSON HERE!!!!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] *explodes*

KR: *picks up the remains of HS* Well, we won't have to worry about him anymore.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img]
